    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_111459</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy levels jumps in absorption and emission spectroscopy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energiestufen springt in Absorption und in 
Emissionspektroskopie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les forces branche en absorption et spectroscopie 
d'émission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os níveis de energia saltam no absorption e no 
spectroscopy da emissão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I livelli di energia salta in assorbimento e 
spettroscopia dell'emissione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλματα ενεργειακών επιπέδων στη φασματοσκοπία 
απορρόφησης και εκπομπής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los niveles de energía saltan en la absorción y
espectroscopia de la emisión</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that energy level jumps are seen in both the absorption and emission spectra.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">emission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy levels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spectra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spectroscopy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Energiestufe Sprünge
in die Absorption und in die Emissionspektren gesehen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que des sauts de force 
sont vus dans l'absorption et des spectres d'émission.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os saltos do nível 
de energia estão vistos  no absorption e em spectra de emissão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i salti del 
livello di energia sono visti sia nell'assorbimento che negli spettri 
di emissione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα άλματα ενεργειακών 
επιπέδων βλέπουνε και στα φάσματα απορρόφησης και εκπομπής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los saltos del 
nivel de energía están considerados en la absorción y los espectros
de emisión.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
